thread.title: Warriors’ coach Kerr leaves team to rehab bad back
thread.title_full: Warriors’ coach Kerr leaves team to rehab bad back - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rusty Simmons
title: Warriors’ coach Kerr leaves team to rehab bad back
text:
Photo: Scott Strazzante, The Chronicle Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr walks the sideline prior to the start of Game 4 of The NBA Finals between the Golden State Warriors and Cleveland Cavaliers at The Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday, June 11, 2015 in Cleveland, Ohio. Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr walks the sideline prior to...
Warriors head coach Steve Kerr is taking a medical leave of absence for an unspecified amount of time as he continues to rehabilitate from two offseason back surgeries, the team announced Thursday. Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr walks the sideline prior to the start of Game 4 of The NBA Finals between the Golden State Warriors and Cleveland Cavaliers at The Quicken Loans Arena on Thursday, June 11, 2015 in Cleveland, Ohio. Golden State Warriors' Coach Steve Kerr walks the sideline prior to...
Warriors head coach Steve Kerr is taking a medical leave of absence for an unspecified amount of time as he continues to rehabilitate from two offseason back surgeries, the team announced Thursday.
